title: Imperial Festival - Performance and Popping Workshop
desc: Funkology taking part of Imperial Festival! We will be teaching basics and popping to anyone!

title: CGCU Week - Flashmob 05/03/2014
desc: We organised a surprising flashmob in the middle of Queens Lawn!

title: Loughborough Competition 09/03/2014
desc: Loughborough competition 2014! Unfortunately the crew did not place due to the high standard of the competition. See you Loughborough next year!

title: East Meets West 2014
htmlDesc: Funkology crew and the society people performing at EMW 2014! Check out our performance onYouTube!

title: Mega Maalai 2014
htmlDesc: Funkology crew and the society people performing at MM 2014! Check out our performance on YouTube!

title: 10 Year Anniversary FuNkoLoGy workshop 07/12/2013
htmlDesc: Come check out some awesome dancing in a special FuNkoLoGy workshop on Saturday 7th December! Teaching will be done by Del Mak, Lady Venus and Temi Lampejo. Find out more at our event page!
location: Union Dining Hall (first floor), Imperial College Union, Beit Quad
price: *FREE* for members, Â£7 pounds for non members! (Deffo get membership!)

title: RHUL Competition 30/11/2013
desc: Our crew is participating in the Royal Holloway Competition! Let's show them some love and support!!

title: Fresher's Fair 01/10/2013
htmlDesc: Check out our stall near Metric at Fresher's Fair. Come say hi to us, buy a shirt maybe, watch our performances and sign up to our mailing list to stay up to date with classes and events.
location: Metric (Ground floor), Imperial College Union, Beit Quad

title: Loughborough Competition 02/03/2013
htmlDesc: Our crew went to UK's biggest dance competition Loughborough and won first place! Woo! Still hyped! Check them out on youtube!

title: bigTime Xmas Workshop 08/12/2012
desc: FuNkoLoGy have brought in our good friends from bigTime, a London based dance crew, to hold a charity workshop!! bigTime is a crew full of incredibly talented dancers and choreographers, so don't sleep on this!
htmlDesc:
Click here for the Facebook event page.

title: Pizza Social 10/11/2012
desc: Come to our first Pizza social of the year!! Free pizza to be had by everyone!! What better way to make some new friends than banter over hard-earned pizza after class. Crew will also be there so get mingling!
